item.title: About
item.description: Tester / Agilist / Mountain Biker / Geekdad Hi, my name is Grant and I created this place so that I had somewhere to dump my thoughs on the internet. I currently work as an Agile feature team lead for a UK bank, leading a team delivering modern digital banking solutions (or something) but as anyone who’s ever described themselves as a “Testing Professional” will know, I’ll always be a Tester at heart.
